column2: This was the sword that Walach used to cut down the true Grand Master of the Order of the Blood Dragon. Its keen edge means red ruin to any who dare oppose him.
This chalice contains the life blood of the greatest opponents Walach has slain in battle. Their pure and noble blood is a potent source of power to any Vampire who drinks it.
This banner instills Harkons knights with the legacy of vengeance after Mikael, second in command to Walach was slain.
